title: 2004년 Randy Hurley v. State of Tennessee 사건

description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Randy Hurley v. State of Tennessee
**판결일**: 2004-07-12
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Tennessee
**관할**: Tennessee, TN

**판사**: Judge John Everett Williams


## 판결문 요약

         IN THE COURT OF CRIMINAL APPEALS OF TENNESSEE
                          AT KNOXVILLE
                               Assigned on Briefs June 15, 2004

            RANDY D. HURLEY v. HOWARD CARLTON, WARDEN

                  Direct Appeal from the Criminal Court for Johnson County
                             No. 4303    Lynn W. Brown, Judge


                      No. E2004-00381-CCA-R3-HC - Filed July 12, 2004


The petitioner appeals the trial court’s dismissal of his petition for writ of habeas corpus. We agree
with the habeas court that the petitioner has failed to state a facially valid claim for habeas corpus
relief. We affirm the habeas court’s dismissal of the petitioner’s application for the writ of habeas
corpus.

     Tenn. R. App. P. 3 Appeal as of Right; Judgment of the Criminal Court Affirmed

JOHN EVERETT WILLIAMS, J., delivered the opinion of the court, in which JOSEPH M. TIPTON and
THOMAS T. WOODALL, JJ., joined.

Randy D. Hurley, Mountain City, Tennessee, Pro Se.

Paul G. Summers, Attorney General and Reporter, and Brent C. Cherry, Assistant Attorney General,
for the appellee, Howard D. Carlton, Warden.

                                              OPINION

        The petitioner, Randy D. Hurley, appeals the Johnson County Criminal Court’s dismissal of
his petition for writ of habeas corpus. A Cocke County jury found the petitioner guilty of
premeditated first degree murder, felony murder, and armed robbery. State v. Hurley, 876 S.W.2d
57, 60 (Tenn...
